entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Periods of light snow beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle changing to snow late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
